p: At the end of each complete growing season (i.e. years 1 through 3), above‐ground biomass was harvested once most of the foliage had senesced, dried for 48 hr at 50 0C and weighed. These measurements (hereafter, “season‐end biomass”) represent for each individual the combined outcome of above‐ground allocation and herbivory, including plant compensation for damage (see below).
